settings.title: Our Materials
settings.paragraph: We remain 100% cruelty-free and strive to bring more sustainable options to every home. Our vegan fur is made in the most sustainable and ethical factories around the world.

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.paragraph: We believe in in a home goods brand for good homes. We build great products that youâ€™ll keep for generations.

settings.title: Our Goals
settings.paragraph: Far from perfect, we are always striving to do better. This season over 50% of our product is made of recycled vegan fur, one of the highest percentages in the home goods space. Our packaging has been transitioned to be made with recyclable materials. We promise to keep working towards 100% ethical and sustainable practices, create more innovative fabrics, and continue on our journey to building Home Goods for Good Homes.
